籤詩版本二:
Izihlahla zikaphayini nemisayipuresi ziqhakaza, futhi imvula, iqhwa, umoya nesithwathwa kuyizinto okumelwe zenziwe.
Ikusasa liyoba ukusetshenziswa okukhulu ngokuzumayo, futhi udumo luyoba insika.
詩意:
Le hexagram ifana nehlathi eliluhlaza likaphayini nemisayipuresi.
Kukhona izicukuthwane kukho konke.
解曰: Ngikufisela inhlanhla emgwaqeni. Inkonzo yempilo yonke encomekayo. Izikelemu zasensimini sezivuthiwe. Umndeni uyachuma.
籤詩故事一:
◇U-Fan Wenzheng unqume ukuhliphiza futhi adwebe iphalishi
U-Fan Zhongyan, isikhulu esidumile ebukhosini beNgoma, wayephuma emndenini ompofu esemncane. Wayefundela endaweni yokuhlala indela eNtabeni i-Changbai. Wayepheka iphalishi ngamalitha amabili onyaluthi nsuku zonke. Ngemva kokuba liqina ubusuku bonke, walisika. izingcezu ezine ngommese, wadla izingcezu ezimbili ekuseni nakusihlwa, wasika amakhukhamba ukuba adle.
Lokhu kusetshenziselwa ukuchaza umuntu ongakwesabi ubunzima, ofunda kanzima, futhi ekugcineni abe yithalente lokusebenzisa kakhulu.
Sika ihhashi bese udweba iphalishi
聖意: UJiazhai uzifunela yena, uzifunela ingcebo, ukuthula, ibhizinisi, umshado, impumelelo, uLiujia, abahamba ngezinyawo besilisa, izinkundla zokuthembana, izikelemu, imfuyo eyisithupha, umonakalo, ukulandelela abantu, amacala, ukufuduka, impahla elahlekile, ukugula, ithuna lase-Anshan, ubuhle.
古人: Umlandeli u-Wenzheng unquma ukuhliphiza adwebe uphuthu
